name: Swift Boots
description: Core boots for most marksmen, providing both movement and attack speed.

name: Warrior Boots
passive: Each basic attack received grants 5-25 Physical Defense, up to 25 points. Lasts 3s.
description: Defensive boots choice for marksmen against assassins.

name: Scarlet Phantom
passive: Critical hits increase attack speed by 30% and critical chance by 10% for 2s.
description: Core critical item that scales with attack speed.

name: Windtalker
passive: Every 5 basic attacks trigger a wind strike dealing 200 magic damage to 3 enemies.
description: Provides wave clear and movement speed.

name: Demon Hunter Sword
passive: Basic attacks deal 3% of target's current HP as additional Physical Damage. Dealing damage grants 3% Physical Lifesteal for 3s, stacking up to 5 times.

name: Golden Staff
passive: Basic attacks no longer critical, but attack speed increases damage. Gain 1 physical attack for every 2% attack speed.
description: Converts crit to consistent damage based on attack speed.

name: Corrosion Scythe
passive: Basic attacks slow enemies by 8% for 1.5s, stacking up to 5 times.
description: Provides strong kiting and chasing capability.

name: Endless Battle
passive: After using a skill, next basic attack deals 85% physical attack as true damage. 1.5s cooldown.
description: Ideal for heroes who weave skills with basic attacks.

name: Malefic Roar
passive: Gain 0.5% extra physical penetration for every 1% HP the target has, up to 20%.
description: Core penetration item for late game.

name: Haas's Claws
passive: When HP is below 40%, gain 25% extra lifesteal.

name: Sea Halberd
passive: Dealing damage reduces target's shield and HP regen by 50% for 3s.
description: Counter item for high sustain enemies.

name: Wind of Nature
active: Immune to all physical damage for 2s. 90s cooldown.
description: Defensive item to survive physical assassins.

name: Athena's Shield
passive: Gains shield that absorbs 170-1150 magic damage. Regenerates after not taking damage for 8s.
description: Best magic defense item for marksmen.
